page.title: 05BALNACRAIG HILL FARM
page.content: We spoke to Mr.Walker who told us that it was very rough working a{hill {farm,}especially in the winter. He added that you had to be prepared. There was{no}such thing as an{average {day}but the following would be an idea:{6.00 am}-check lambing ewes(150) feed cattle(60)breakfast. {7.30 am}-milk cows(2)feed lambs (3)by bottle,check other stock(30)work in fields. {Noon}-lunch,feed calves(4)check lambing ewes,work in fields. {5.30 pm}-tea,feed cattle,feed lambs,check sheep stock. {8.00 pm}-milk cows,feed lambs, check stock. All{cattle}are kept{inside}during the winter.They are fed with hay or straw, turnips,bruised barley or oats mixed with nuts.
